message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and offer it to you at the special price of $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to pay $14,000 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I had a higher price in mind, I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  I believe this product offers you significant value, even at that price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $18,000. I'd be willing to pay $15,000 for the product.
